ch.powerunit.rules.TestListenerRule

  • Packages that use TestListenerRule 
    Package Description
    ch.powerunit

    ch.powerunit.rules
    Default implementation or abstract for rule.

    • Uses of TestListenerRule in ch.powerunit.rules

      Subinterfaces of TestListenerRule in ch.powerunit.rules 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ExternalResource
      Default Rule to do some stuff before the test, and after (always).
      interface  SystemStreamRule
      This is a test rule to change the system out/ err stream.
      interface  TemporaryFolder
      This rule provides a way to support temporary folder.
      Classes in ch.powerunit.rules that implement TestListenerRule 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SystemPropertiesRule
      Rule that restore system properties after test.
      class  TestContextRule
      This rule can be used to have access to the test execution context from inside a test.
